name: International Cheese Council of Canada
legal: Corporation incorporated under Canada Not-for-profit Corporations Act
goal: The International Cheese Council of Canada represents Canadian importers of cheese, including cheese imported under the Tariff Rate Quotas (TRQ) created by the Canada and European Union (EU) Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, External Relations, Trade
euInitiatives: The Canada and European Union (EU) Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
